27FD4CE1.Line7.6E261: When he saw me, he approached to ask about the prison warden. I directed him to the palace guard. Only hours later, and the servants are whispering about some disaster at the dungeons. It can only be him.

5A1FE05B.Line1.6E261:
Dearest, 
Death comes for this hellhole we call home. There was a pale stranger, Elias, he called himself, skulking about the kitchen halls today.

C1F1C663.Line9.6E261:
I have an awful feeling. Will you meet me tonight at the teahouse? I could use a warm cup. And your company. 
-Yours always, Oyuun
